text: Paul Kalas (August 13, 1967) is an American astronomer. His discovery of a planet outside of our solar system become famous. The planet is referred to as Fomalhaut b.Kalas P et al.1994Optical Images of an Exosolar Planet 25 Light Years from Earth ==References== ==Other website== *http://arxiv.org/PS_cache/arxiv/pdf/0811/0811.1994v2.pdf *P. G. Kalas at Berkeley Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American astronomers
title: Paul Kalas
